text: kavurun rju margayehi yanneda, ohu tamange hondatama rju margayehi gaman karanneya. kavurun væradi margayehi yanneda, ohu (væradi margayehi gos) tamanta haniyak kara ganneya. kenekuge pav bara, venat keneku usulanne næta. (biya ganva anaturu angavana apage) dutayava noyavana turu api (kisivekutat) danduvam karanne næta
